translations: adj.骨髓的；骨髓状的；由骨髓而来的；脊髓的

phrs.translation: 慢性骨髓白血病；慢性粒细胞白血病

sentences.sentence: ETP cells retained the ability to become either t cells or myeloid cells.
sentences.translation: 早期胸腺祖细胞同时保留成为T细胞或髓细胞能力。

sentences.sentence: Local MBL expression, by myeloid cells, is shown to critically control development of atherosclerotic lesions.
sentences.translation: 髓系细胞表达的MBL在动脉粥样硬化损伤进展中起着临界控制的作用。

sentences.sentence: To the surprise of Bell and Bhandoola, most of the cultures begun with single cells had become a mixture of T cells and myeloid cells.
sentences.translation: 出乎Bell和Bhandoola意料的是，大多数原先只有单个细胞的培养基中生成了髓细胞和T细胞的混合物。
